profile.name: Maria
profile.title: Fallen Witch Maria
profile.story: Although she was a Holy Maiden of Lua in the past, she eventually fell into corruption. Now, this cynical, crow-commanding witch curses her former Goddess from the darkness. There was a time when she was a friend of Kyle and a heroine of the people. However, when Kyle disappeared, she hid herself from the world as well. She eventually came back as a fallen witch, threatening mankind as the spearhead of the Demon Army. These days, however, she appears to be plotting some scheme, not as a Demon commander, but completely on her own.

1.name: Raven Storm
1.description:
Deals [ffc800]446*(0.7+(0.3*Skill Level*Awakening Coefficient))+186.1% ATK[-] Magic DMG to enemies in a frontal area [64ffff]{2} times[-], pushing them back, and reduces their ATK Spd by [ff6464]15%[-] and Magic DEF by [ff6464]10%[-] for [64ffff]4sec[-]. Against non-hero enemies, each hit deals additional [ffc800]446*(0.7+(0.3*Skill Level*Awakening Coefficient))+186.1% ATK[-] Magic DMG.

[ffc800]Awakening Coefficient([-]★1 ~ 5[ffc800]): [[-] 1 / 2 / 3.5 / 5.5 / 8 [ffc800]][-]

2.name: Claw of Restriction
2.description:
Deals [ffc800]608*(0.7+(0.3*Skill Level*Awakening Coefficient))+253.4% ATK[-] Magic DMG to [64ffff]2[-] enemy and inflicts [fa96fa]Bind[-] for [64ffff]2sec[-]. The damaged enemy takes [ffc800]18% ATK[-] Magic DoT every [64ffff]0.5sec[-] for [64ffff]6sec[-], and Magic DMG taken is increased by [ff6464]20%[-].

[ffc800]Awakening Coefficient([-]★1 ~ 5[ffc800]): [[-] 1 / 2 / 3.5 / 5.5 / 8 [ffc800]][-]

3.name: Area of Darkness
3.description:
Pulls enemies within range toward the center[-] and deals [ffc800]338*(0.7+(0.3*Skill Level*Awakening Coefficient))+140.8% ATK[-] Magic DMG [64ffff]{2} times[-]. The final hit stuns enemies for [64ffff]1sec[-]. Against non-hero enemies, deals additional [ffc800]338*(0.7+(0.3*Skill Level*Awakening Coefficient))+140.8% ATK[-] Magic DMG.

[ffc800]Awakening Coefficient([-]★1 ~ 5[ffc800]): [[-] 1 / 2 / 3.5 / 5.5 / 8 [ffc800]][-]

4.name: Black Wind
4.description:
Increases Critical Hit Chance by [64ff64]150[-]. Each time damage is dealt, applies [fa96fa][Lea's Curse][-] to the target for [64ffff]10sec[-].
[fa96fa][Lea's Curse]:[-] Critical Hit Chance is reduced by [ff6464]100[-], and ATK is reduced by [ff6464]10%[-].

light.effect: Mana cost increases by 1000, but damage increases by 100%.
Mana cost increases by 2000, but the target is changed to all enemies.
Increases the target’s Magic DMG taken by 15% for 10 sec.

dark.effect: Mana cost is increased by 1000, but damage dealt is increased by 100%.

light.effect: For each enemy affected by [Lea's Curse], your Attack increases by 10%. This effect stacks up to 5 times and cannot be dispelled.

dark.effect: Reduces the target’s Magic Critical Resistance by 20% for 10 sec.
On critical hit, reduces the target’s Status Resistance by 200 for 10 sec, and reduces the cooldown of all skills except the skill in use by 2%.

uw.name: Lea's Messenger, Cocytus
uw.description: Upon a Critical Hit, reduces target's Healing Rate by 35% for 10 sec and increases own Critical Damage by {0}%. The Critical Damage increase effect stacks up to 20 times.
uw.story: A mysterious raven that can travel across dimensions. Its intelligence and shrewdness are certainly not those of a mere bird. In truth, it is a monster filled with dark energy, much like Demons. Indeed, it is said that this beast is as powerful as a high-ranking Demon. Some claim that it occasionally flies over fields of battle, speaking in human languages. Much of this creature's identity is still shrouded in mystery.

1.name: Pendant of Darkness
1.description: [Raven Storm] Gains immunity to CC for the skill's duration, and reduces the target's Mana by {0}.
1.story: Ashes of a grey messenger that announces the end. These are the ashes of the raven that flew into the Church of Lua right before the Dukedom of Gray collapsed a hundred years ago. Everyone ignored the ominous messenger, and only Priestess Maria cared for it until its last day. Even after its death, it has helped Maria expand her area of darkness by pouring its dark energy on her.

2.name: Spirit's Sabaton
2.description: [Claw of Restriction] Increases DMG by 50% and increases M.Weakness of the affected enemy by {0}% for 10 sec.
2.story:
A claw armor that Maria gifted to Lea's messenger. 
The claw armor that is made with fancy gold contains a binding curse that never lets go of any enemy that it grabs. Enemies bound by the messenger's Sabaton will become defenseless against magic attacks and will receive great damage.

3.name: Turbulent Dance
3.description: [Area of Darkness] increases DMG by {0}%, and its last attack reduces the target’s M.DEF by 30% for 7 sec.
3.story:
A magic mirror that summons Tempest Elemental Aerial.
This magical mirror is made with an obsidian stone from Pandemonium, and Tempest Elemental Aerial sleeps inside it. Whenever Raven Storm is used, Aerial awakes and amplifies its effect with its violent dance.

4.name: Abyssal Letter
4.description: [Black Wind] Attacks enemies inflicted with Curse of Lea every 10 sec, dealing M.DMG equal to 200% of ATK, and increasing own ATK by {0}% for 20 sec per hit enemy. This effect can be stacked up to max 10 times.
4.story:
A letter of notice issued from Lea's Messenger.
This letter created by the Essence of Darkness contains a warning and the terms of the contract that Maria made with the darkness.
